author: TheSkiF4er
name: ProdStarterHub - Go CLI Tool
shortDescription: Production-ready Go CLI template (Cobra + Viper + Zap + Prometheus) with sensible defaults for configuration, logging, metrics and packaging.

ProjectName.description: The project/binary name for the scaffolded CLI.

GoVersion.description: Go toolchain version to target in CI & docs.

IncludeDocker.description: Include a multi-stage Dockerfile for reproducible builds.

IncludeTests.description: Include unit/integration test scaffold and example tests.

IncludeCI.description: Include GitHub Actions workflows for build, lint, test and release.

IncludeMetrics.description: Include Prometheus metrics server example and flags.

postActions.description: Run 'go mod tidy' to ensure dependencies are resolved

manualInstructions.text: Run 'go mod tidy' in the project root to fetch and prune module dependencies.

postActions.description: Attempt a local build to verify the scaffold compiles

manualInstructions.text: Run 'go build ./...' or 'make build' to verify the project builds successfully.

postActions.description: Initialize a git repository and create an initial commit

manualInstructions.text: Run 'git init && git add . && git commit -m "Initial scaffold from ProdStarterHub Go CLI template"'

args.args: -lc "git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial scaffold from ProdStarterHub Go CLI template' || true"

symbolsHelp.description: Customize project generation. Typical usage: set ModuleName to your module path, set ProjectName, and run 'go mod tidy' and 'go build'.
usageExamples:
# Initialize project and build
cp -R go-cli-tool my-tool && cd my-tool
# set module name
go mod init github.com/yourorg/my-tool
# tidy and build
go mod tidy
go build ./...
